summary: Gives Paarthurnax two dragon initiates after the Main Quest. By request
descriptionHtml:
This is daventry's request. At the end of the Main Quest, Paarthurnax declares that he is going to find some dovah to teach the Way of the Voice, now that Alduin is gone.

This mod simply adds two such initiates to the Throat of the World after the Main Quest ends. It doesn't trigger until you actually leave the Throat at the end of the MQ. But when you come back, they should be there.

They don't do anything, I'm afraid. But it just adds a teeny tiny bit to the immersion.

PLEASE NOTE: This will NOT work if you load a save in which the Main Quest has already been completed. You must complete the last part of the Main Quest (i.e. defeating Alduin and leaving Sovngarde) with the mod active in order for the initiates to appear.

[b][u]OTHER MODS BY ME[/u]:[/b]

2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30633]Als Paragon Reward Chest[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all 5 Paragons[/i]
3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30643]Als Konahrik[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all vanilla dragon priest masks with a previously missing boss fight[/i]
